hume
Class ReasonablePriceTG

java.lang.Object
  hume.TrustGame
      hume.ReasonablePriceTG

public class ReasonablePriceTG
extends TrustGame

The class ReasonablePriceTGdefines a trust game where the price depends on the competence (and thus the expected value) of the supplier.

Author:
eckhart

Method Summary
protected  double costs(double competence)
          Returns the cost for solving a problem depending on the competence of the player.
protected  double price(double suppliersCompetence)
          Returns the payment a customer has to give a supplier for solving the customer's problem.
protected  double value(double competence)
          Returns the overall value an agent produces when solving a problem with a certain competence.

Method Detail

costs

protected double costs(double competence)
Description copied from class: TrustGame
Returns the cost for solving a problem depending on the competence of the player. The higher the competence, the lower the cost.

Specified by:
costs in class TrustGame
Parameters:
competence - the competence of the player
Returns:
the cost incurred

price

protected double price(double suppliersCompetence)
Description copied from class: TrustGame
Returns the payment a customer has to give a supplier for solving the customer's problem.

The payment lies always between the costs for the solution and the value of the solution. HUME 2.0: payment should depend on the announced competence rather than the real competence of the supplier.

Specified by:
price in class TrustGame
Parameters:
suppliersCompetence - the competence of the supplier (upon which the costs and the value depend)
Returns:
the payment

value

protected double value(double competence)
Description copied from class: TrustGame
Returns the overall value an agent produces when solving a problem with a certain competence.

Specified by:
value in class TrustGame
Returns:
the value produced
